get.summary: Returns a list of GraphModels from the specified workspace.
get.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).

This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).

## Permissions

 The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

Workspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: A token for retrieving the next page of results.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.

post.summary: Creates a GraphModel in the specified workspace.
post.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).

This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 To create GraphModel with a public definition, refer to [GraphModel](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/graph-model) article. 

 ## Permissions 
 The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 Item.ReadWrite.All 

## Limitations 
- To create a GraphModel the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

202.description: Request accepted, GraphModel provisioning in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid

* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.

* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.

post.summary: Returns the specified GraphModel public definition.
post.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).

This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

When you get a GraphModel's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the GraphModel. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the GraphModel public definition.

202.description: Request accepted. Retrieving the definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item.

post.summary: Overrides the definition for the specified GraphModel.
post.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).

This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 
Updating the GraphModel's definition, does not affect its sensitivity label. 

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the GraphModel. 
## Required Delegated Scopes

 Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

parameters.name: updateMetadata
parameters.description: When set to true and the .platform file is provided as part of the definition, the item's metadata is updated using the metadata in the .platform file

202.description: Request accepted. Update definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item. 

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.

post.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).

## Required Delegated Scopes

GraphModel.Execute.All or Item.Execute.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

202.description: Request accepted, job execution is in progress.

Location.description: The URL to the job instance resource.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* MissingMinimalPermisisons - The caller does not have sufficient permissions to run job instance. n
* InvalidJobType - The requested job type is invalid. 

* TooManyRequestsForJobs - The caller is making to many run on-demand job requests. 

* ItemNotFound - Requested item id not found.

post.summary: Executes a query on the specified graph model.
post.description:
> [!NOTE]
> GraphModel item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).
> This API is part of a Preview release and is provided for evaluation and development purposes only. It may change based on feedback and is not recommended for production use.
**When calling this API, callers must specify `true` as the value for the query parameter `preview`.**

This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).

## Permissions

 The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

Workspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |

## Interface

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: This required parameter must be set to `true` to access this API, which is currently in preview.

200.description: Query execution completed successfully. Results are in JSON format. Refer to the [MSFT GQL API](https://aka.ms/msft-gqlapi) on how to read the data.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item. 

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.
